translations: 结合，配合；动词的词形变化

sentences.sentence: So practice the verb conjugations (you know: I am, you are, he is...) in both directions.
sentences.translation: 所以，从两方面练习动词的变化(你知道的像：i am you are he is…)。

sentences.sentence: Learning a foreign language draws your focus to the mechanics of language: grammar, conjugations, and sentence structure.
sentences.translation: 学习外语会将你的注意力集中在语言结构本身：语法，词形变化和句子结构。

sentences.sentence: This also means less words to memorize and you can (sort of) mix-and-match words with known conjugations to form your own word.
sentences.translation: 这意味着你可以少背单词而且可以(在一定程度上)根据已知的构词法来混合搭配以创造自己的词汇。
